images.name: BRO 44790/Pub/Ph/7
images.description: Promotional photograph of folk singer Fred Wedlock, commissioned by Coast Records/The Rocket Record Company, from the collection of Fred's wife Sue Wedlock. Date not known, but likely to be from around the time of his hit single The Oldest Swinger In Town, 1981.

name: Fred Wedlock - 'the disco king meets Yogi Bear'
description: Promo photo of Fred Wedlock, posing as 'The Oldest Swinger In Town' - the name of his 1981 hit single.

parent.name: Fred Wedlock - 'The Oldest Swinger In Town'
